Still, some details about Doe's lawsuit are 
raising eyebrowsâ€”in particular because 
the allegations seem to match up 
with at least one of Epstein's alleged co-
conspirators. 
If this complaint was filed by 
one of his co-conspirators, 
who "played an outsized role in Jeffrey 
Epstein's 
devastating abuse of minors for over a decade and 
profited handsomely including owning a company 
affiliated with Epstein, it is a 
brazen abuse of our civil 
justice system," said Sigrid McCawley, a 
partner at 
Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who represents multiple 
victims of Epstein. "But above 
all, it is a shameless act 
and a disgraceful insult 
to the real victims."
